sentences.en: Barnaby may be 15, but he's nippy and suited to badminton.
sentences.cn: 巴纳比可能15岁了，但他动作敏捷，适合打羽毛球。

sentences.en: He suited his speech to the audience.
sentences.cn: 他使自己的演说适合听众的口味.

sentences.en: He wanted to look for occupation suited to his abilities.
sentences.cn: 他想找个适合自己才能的职业

sentences.en: He wasn't suited for the job and left after two weeks.
sentences.cn: 他不适合做这份工作,两周后就离职了.

sentences.en: It took her two hours to pick a dress that suited her.
sentences.cn: 她花了两个小时才挑选了一件合适的衣服.

sentences.en: It's not really suited to absolute beginners.
sentences.cn: 它并不真正适合从零开始的初学者。

sentences.en: Satellites are uniquely suited to provide this information.
sentences.cn: 只有人造卫星能提供此类信息。

sentences.en: She was ideally suited to the job.
sentences.cn: 她是这项工作的理想人选.

sentences.en: She was ideally suited to the part of Eva Peron.
sentences.cn: 她演爱娃∙庇隆这个角色再合适不过了。

sentences.en: Sheep are particularly well suited for domestication.
The area is well suited to road cycling as well as off-road riding.
sentences.cn: 这个地区很适合公路自行车竞赛和越野骑马。

sentences.en: The two of them suited each other perfectly.
They were an extremely happy couple, ideally suited.
sentences.cn: 他们是极其幸福、无比般配的一对。

sentences.en: They were well suited to each other.
sentences.cn: 他们俩是天造地设的一对。

sentences.en: This measure is suited to some localities, but not to others.
sentences.cn: 这个措施有地方适用,有地方不适用.

sentences.en: When you've suited up , come into the machine room.

words.tran_cn: 适宜；相配；供给…衣服（suit的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: If something is well suited to a particular purpose, it is right or appropriate for that purpose. If someone is well suited to a particular job, they are right or appropriate for that job.
